"A.D.2028/4/25/15:00": "Fufu.. you easily surpass even I, the original wizard and spellcaster. "
"But this is okay. This is fine. The invocation of God is complete."

"...Invocation of God? What does that mean,
Ardem?"
"Take a wild guess. Even if it's just a product of embodiment, there's no way God will manifest without some sacrifice."
"The advent requires a suitable offering. We need a vessel for God to enter."
"And it can't just be any half-hearted human. It must be a suitable vessel."
"For example, someone who went beyond human limits, who has been cursed by God, one who has lived for a very long time."
"Yes, that's good. My body is a worthy vessel."
"God, my father. This vessel you created... from the dust of the land."
"I won't let you say... that you don't want to descend."
"Fu, hehehehe heh... Are you sure this is okay, Phaleg? Don't you need to go help them and-"
"I'm sure there's no need for me to go. I believe in the strength of humanity. Shall we continue?"
